entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. POP 40%

Wind chill minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
